name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
description: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone (also known as Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone in the United States) is a 2001 fantasy film directed by Chris Columbus and produced by David Heyman. The film stars Daniel Radcliffe as Harry Potter, with Rupert Grint and Emma Watson.

name: Garfield: The Movie
description: Garfield: The Movie is a 2004 American comedy film based on Jim Davis' comic strip Garfield. Directed by Peter Hewitt and starring Bill Murray as Garfield's voice.

name: Inception
description: Inception is a 2010 science fiction action film written and directed by Christopher Nolan. It stars Leonardo DiCaprio as a professional thief who steals information by infiltrating the subconscious.

name: The Dark Knight
description: The Dark Knight is a 2008 superhero film directed by Christopher Nolan, featuring Christian Bale as Batman and Heath Ledger as the Joker.

name: Avatar
description: Avatar is a 2009 epic science fiction film directed by James Cameron. It stars Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, and Sigourney Weaver.

name: Titanic
description: Titanic is a 1997 epic romance and disaster film directed by James Cameron. It stars Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet.

name: Interstellar
description: Interstellar is a 2014 epic science fiction film directed by Christopher Nolan, starring Matthew McConaughey and Anne Hathaway.

name: The Matrix
description: The Matrix is a 1999 science fiction action film written and directed by the Wachowskis. It stars Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, and Carrie-Anne Moss.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: The Fellowship of the Ring is a 2001 epic fantasy adventure film directed by Peter Jackson, based on the novel by J.R.R. Tolkien.

name: The Lion King
description: The Lion King is a 1994 American animated musical film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation. It tells the story of Simba, a lion prince.

name: Forrest Gump
description: Forrest Gump is a 1994 American comedy-drama film directed by Robert Zemeckis and starring Tom Hanks as the title character.

name: Shrek
description: Shrek is a 2001 American computer-animated comedy film loosely based on William Steig's 1990 picture book.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
description: A 2003 American fantasy adventure film directed by Gore Verbinski and produced by Jerry Bruckheimer, starring Johnny Depp.

name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Spider-Man: No Way Home is a 2021 superhero film directed by Jon Watts, starring Tom Holland and Benedict Cumberbatch.

name: Joker
description: Joker is a 2019 American psychological thriller film directed by Todd Phillips and starring Joaquin Phoenix.

name: Frozen
description: Frozen is a 2013 American 3D computer-animated musical fantasy film produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios.

name: Toy Story
description: Toy Story is a 1995 American computer-animated comedy film produced by Pixar and released by Walt Disney Pictures.

name: The Godfather
description: The Godfather is a 1972 American crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola, based on Mario Puzo's best-selling novel.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: Pulp Fiction is a 1994 American crime film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino. It stars John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, and Uma Thurman.

name: Gladiator
description: Gladiator is a 2000 epic historical drama film directed by Ridley Scott and starring Russell Crowe as a betrayed Roman general.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 American drama film written and directed by Frank Darabont, starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman.

name: The Avengers
description: The Avengers is a 2012 American superhero film produced by Marvel Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures.
